billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides for the labeling of food or food products that contain a genetically modified material or that are produced with a genetically modified material
summary: Provides for the labeling of food or food products that contain a genetically modified material or that are produced with a genetically modified material; defines terms; imposes penalties for false labels and misbranding; sets forth exemptions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the labeling of genetically modified foods
